holidays.title: Black Friday 2022
holidays.description: Prepare to shell out some cash on the biggest shopping day of the year!

holidays.title: International Day for the Elimination of Violence Against Women
holidays.description: Today marks the beginning of 16 days of activism, culminating in International Human Rights Day.

holidays.title: Blasé Day
holidays.description: On this unique holiday, take pleasure in not having to pretend to find pleasure in anything!

holidays.title: Buy Nothing Day
holidays.description: An effort to combat the unethical and sometimes even dangerous mob shopping behaviors of Black Friday.

holidays.title: Day of Listening
holidays.description: There's something interesting for everyone to say or hear, so listen up!

holidays.title: Flossing Day
holidays.description: Learn the history of flossing and why you need to floss every day.

holidays.title: Fur-Free Friday
holidays.description: Today we denounce our cruelty, in the name of fashion, to fur-bearing animals.

holidays.title: Maize Day
holidays.description: The time has come to unwrap and savor this gift of nature.

holidays.title: National Day of Bosnia & Herzigovina
holidays.description: Understand the history and significance of this national holiday with our help.

holidays.title: National Parfait Day
holidays.description: Get your parfait spoon ready, as we prepare to indulge in layers of perfect, creamy deliciousness.

holidays.title: National Play Day with Dad
holidays.description: Spend the day doing some fun activities with your kids and create life-long memories.

holidays.title: Native American Heritage Day
holidays.description: Native Americans form the foundation of American culture, and that makes this day special.

holidays.title: Shopping Reminder Day
holidays.description: On your marks, get set, shop!

holidays.title: Sinkie Day
holidays.description: Are you a sinkie? This special day was created just for you!

holidays.title: Suriname Independence Day
holidays.description: From Dutch colonization to military regimes, Suriname has seen it all and persevered.

holidays.title: Systems Engineer Day
holidays.description: Systems Engineer Day celebrates those who create computer systems and debug those with problems.

holidays.title: You’re Welcomegiving Day
holidays.description: We’re learning new ways to say “you’re welcome” on this exciting day!

holidays.title: Abby D Phillip’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented digital journalist is known for her role in political correspondence.

holidays.title: Amy Grant’s Birthday
holidays.description: From Christian contemporary to mainstream music, Grant has found great musical success.

holidays.title: Andrew Carnegie’s Birthday
holidays.description: From humble beginnings, this unbelievably successful businessman never forgot his true roots.

holidays.title: Augusto Pinochet’s Birthday
holidays.description: This formidable army general deposed the government and ruled Chile for 17 years.

holidays.title: Casey Holmes’s Birthday
holidays.description: She's a talented content creator and social media personality who's growing her successful career.

holidays.title: Chase Grzegorczyk’s Birthday
holidays.description: If you watch the “Our Family Nest” YouTube channel, you'll know all about this creative YouTuber.

holidays.title: Christina Applegate’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented comedic actress has been entertaining her fans since the ‘80s!

holidays.title: Corbyn Besson’s Birthday
holidays.description: He's still young but he has already taken the music industry by storm.

holidays.title: Dennis Smith Jr.’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this adept athlete, success is in the palm of his hands!

holidays.title: Diego Tinoco’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young actor, model, and social media personality is on his way to becoming a superstar.

holidays.title: Disguised Toast’s Birthday
holidays.description: His gameplaying skills are unlike any other and he knows how to entertain his audience.

holidays.title: Garland Brown’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this model  and reality T.V. star who featured on "Are You the One?"

holidays.title: Jaylen Waddle’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young rookie is all set; he is aiming for the stars and making history!

holidays.title: Jenna Bush Hager’s Birthday
holidays.description: This well-known news show co-anchor comes from a dynastic family of politicians.

holidays.title: Joe DiMaggio’s Birthday
holidays.description: From fishing to baseball, the major league player lived an interesting life.

holidays.title: John F. Kennedy Jr.’s Birthday
holidays.description: This magnetic social figure fell victim to the Kennedy family curse at only 38.

holidays.title: Juliet Angus’s Birthday
holidays.description: This renaissance woman has her hands full with several professional pursuits. There’s no stopping her!

holidays.title: Katie Cassidy’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented performer has been fashioning her own space within the entertainment industry.

holidays.title: Kevin Chamberlin’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this beloved musical theater and television actor who’s brought so much joy to people.

holidays.title: Maura Higgins’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is no stopping this incredible and talented entertainer from achieving an immensely successful career.

holidays.title: Sean Lew’s Birthday
holidays.description: He's a prolific, multi-talented entertainer who's paving a great career for himself through entertainment.

holidays.title: Sonja Morgan’s Birthday
holidays.description: She is a fashionista, a style icon, a “Real Housewife”; she is THE Sonja Morgan.

holidays.title: Trey Traylor’s Birthday
holidays.description: He's an exceptionally dedicated entertainer who's making a successful career out of his art.
